name: Counter Terrorist: City Strike
description:
Go! Go! Go! Fire!Fire!
Welcome to the sniper's world.
New maps, new strategic positions and different guns for you.
Classic FPS SWAT gun Games where you have to face with fully armed murderous terrorists.
Pick up your guns,Aim and shoot for a kill shot!!!
Protect yourself and destroy all the enemies before they can kill you.

Game Features:

- Realistic shooting simulation
- different battle maps
- Real combat effect
- FPS flexible game controllers
- Single Player to Challenge levels.
- Real physical effect of firearms
- Different type of weapons and guns!
- Simple control.
- More enemy
